recipe_name: Parmesan cups with tomato and tapenade
author: Tony Tobin
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Place four chefs' rings on a baking sheet and fill with a handful of parmesan. Bake in the oven for five minutes or until golden. Remove from the oven and while warm and pliable, shape around the top of a rolling pin to form a cup. Mix the tomato, tapenade and basil together and spoon the mixture into each parmesan crisp cup.
ingredients: 55g/2oz parmesan cheese, grated,  1 tomato, chopped,  1 tbsp ready-made tapenade,  handful fresh basil leaves, chopped
